summary.para: The REGPINTYPES structure contains media type information for registering a filter.

remarks.para: This structure is used by the interface to identify the media types that a pin supports. The equivalent AMOVIESETUP_MEDIATYPE type is used in class factory templates (CFactoryTemplate).
To register a range of subtypes within the same major type, use the value MEDIASUBTYPE_NULL.
For more information, see How to Register DirectShow Filters.

summary.para: Major type GUID of the media type.
Sub type GUID of the media type. Can be MEDIASUBTYPE_NULL.
